entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING, Taloyoak
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:27 a.m. MDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Blizzard. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Blizzard developing this afternoon. Blowing snow. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 38 this morning and minus 33 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 9:12 AM MDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Blizzard. Temperature rising to minus 15 by morning.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature rising to minus 15 by morning. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 9:12 AM MDT Saturday 8 April 2023
